name: Sphere Chemistry
description:
Lang:     Dif: 

You are a chemist whose job is to make potions. Using the ancient art of the alchemy of the spheres you should form the ingredients to achieve each combination.

Credits:

Sounds: https://freesound.org

Fonts: https://fontawesome.com

Layout: https://getbootstrap.com

Potion Images: http://poufpoufproduction.fr/

Plugins: https://sweetalert.js.org, https://codeseven.github.io/toastr/, http://touchpunch.furf.com/

Everything else, GreetGreenGoat
